name: INSpeakable
desc: Pronunciation hints for strings used in a spoken interface.

items.name: var pronunciationHint: String?
items.desc: A hint at how the spoken phrase is pronounced.

items.name: var vocabularyIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier associated with the string in your app’s custom vocabulary file.

items.name: var identifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier associated with the string in your app’s custom vocabulary file.

items.name: var alternativeSpeakableMatches: [INSpeakable]?
items.desc: An array of alternative phrases that match the current phrase.
